summary: Pieces of armor from different sets to make 1 unique set.
descriptionHtml:
This mod consists of pieces of armor from different sets to make 1 unique set.  Some pieces are edited, with the author\'s permission, and/or darkened A LOT to go with that stealth look.

UNP Body ONLY.  UNPB will likely work with all but the biggest boobs!

NOT INCLUDED are the mask, the cloak, the horns and the bandolier/pouches shown in the screenshots.

This plugin WILL overwrite any and/or all pieces included that you already have installed.

This plugin includes 4 pieces of armor in total.

The corset from Ceremonial Mage Dress by newmiller.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25533

Another corset, from Morsit Armor by Alelil.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25213

Seraphine\'s Gloves from Seraphine Armor by BloodFree.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24723

And the boots from Ritter Armor by NPR.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13638

The pieces NOT included are from the Ritual Armor of Boethiah by Wasbunnny.  Using the cloak and mask.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24814

The horns from Dark Lilith Sexy Succubus by Nikitaa.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13067

And Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438

All the weapons are from Elven Weaponry HD.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13234


BE SURE TO ACTIVATE ALL FOUR PLUGINS in your plugin manager or launcher.

Each armor piece comes from a separate set, edited to my liking.  So to get each item you either have to craft it(I only included the used pieces from each set)or use the console.

use help to find:
MDblack2
ritter boots
ceremonial mage dress
ceremonial mage necklace
seraphine\'s gloves

E.G. help mdblack2

notice each 8 digit item code next to the items found in console.

use player.additem with each item code, followed by how many you want of each item.

E.G. player.additem 0200df83 1


I believe i have all necessary files for each item.  If not, send me a message or post in comments and I\'ll sort it out.
author: Erenyx
